hedline.hl1: Field Narrows to Four In Lucent Unit Review

abstract.p: Lucent Technologies narrows review for global advertising account of its yet-to-be-renamed microelectronics business, which company plans to spin off, to four finalists from list of nine; initial spending is estimated at $20 million to $25 million (S)

block.p: Lucent Technologies has narrowed a review for the global advertising account of its yet-to-be-renamed microelectronics business -- which the company plans to spin off -- to four finalists from a list of nine. Initial spending was estimated at $20 million to $25 million.

Sue Sienko, director for corporate advertising at Lucent in Murray Hill, N.J., confirmed a report in Adweek this week, listing the agencies as: DDB Worldwide in New York, part of the Omnicom Group; Hill, Holliday, Connors, Cosmopulos in Boston, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; Mullen in Wenham, Mass., part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic; and the Martin Agency in Richmond, Va., also part of Lowe.

Lucent Technologies has narrowed a review for the global advertising account of its yet-to-be-renamed microelectronics business -- which the company plans to spin off -- to four finalists from a list of nine. Initial spending was estimated at $20 million to $25 million.

Sue Sienko, director for corporate advertising at Lucent in Murray Hill, N.J., confirmed a report in Adweek this week, listing the agencies as: DDB Worldwide in New York, part of the Omnicom Group; Hill, Holliday, Connors, Cosmopulos in Boston, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; Mullen in Wenham, Mass., part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic; and the Martin Agency in Richmond, Va., also part of Lowe.

Ms. Sienko said that McCann-Erickson Worldwide in New York, part of the McCann-Erickson World Group unit of Interpublic, the agency that handles corporate advertising for Lucent, had also handled the microelectronics business. She said the agency was not participating in the review for the spinoff because of a conflict with another McCann client she declined to identify.
